snippet: A Dane County Circuit judge said the state law violated federal and state Constitutions with regard to city, county and school district workers.
abstract: Wisconsin Judge Juan B Colas of Dane County Circuit Court strikes down much of the 2011 state law pushed through by Gov Scott Walker that severely restricts the ability of public employees to bargain collectively.
lead_paragraph: A Dane County Circuit judge said the state law violated federal and state Constitutions with regard to city, county and school district workers.

headline.seo: Judge Strikes Parts of Wisconsin Union Law
headline.main: County Judge Strikes Down Some Restrictions on Public Unions in Wisconsin Law
headline.print_headline: County Judge Strikes Down Some Restrictions on Public Unions in Wisconsin Law
